author: Matteo Landi
description: Sweet Manhattan-like in style with chamomile liqueur adding its distinctive floral flavour and honeyed sweetness.
name: Bad Name
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
15 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
